translation.it: - Ci mangiamo una pizza? - Sì, ti prego.

translation.en: -Yeah. -I'm starving.
Where is everybody?
They went out for pizza.
I wasn't hungry.
That brush isn't working. It's too old.
Well, it's the only brush I have.
I'll let you use mine.
-Here. -Thanks.
All right, here. Let me help you.
Wet it if you're gonna get a clean line.
translation.it: Lo devi bagnare per avere una linea uniforme.

translation.en: Close your eyes.
When you are putting on your makeup...
...it's like you're an artist.
But instead of painting on a canvas...
translation.it: Ma invece di dipingere sulla tela...

translation.en: ...you're painting your face.
My mom was a model and she was beautiful.
translation.it: Mia madre era una modella, era bellissima...

translation.en: Tall, blond.
Not like me.
Body that could stop a truck.
translation.it: Un corpo che fermava il traffico.

translation.en: And she had these girlfriends, beautiful girls, Colleen and Shirley...
translation.it: Aveva due amiche bellissime, Colleen e Shirley.

translation.en: ...and they would come over in the morning...
...and put their makeup on together before they went on jobs. Up.
translation.it: ...e si truccavano insieme prima di andare a lavorare.

translation.en: We had a window in the back of our house with a ledge...
...and they would put their mirrors side by side and put out their makeup.
translation.it: ...gli specchietti sul davanzale uno accanto all'altro e si truccavano.

translation.en: They had lipsticks and blushes, and it was fabulous.
I kept thinking, "God, I cannot wait till I get old enough to play with this."
translation.it: Io non vedevo l'ora di diventare grande per giocare con quella roba.

translation.en: Didn't you ever watch your mom put on her makeup?
translation.it: Tu non hai mai guardato tua madre truccarsi?

translation.en: My mom died when I was 7...
translation.it: È morta quando avevo sette anni...

translation.en: ...and it's my first lesson.
You know, you won't be the new girl forever.
translation.it: Non sarai la ragazza nuova per sempre.

translation.en: Beautiful.
Shit.
Ali. Did you use my towel again?
translation.it: Hai usato il mio asciugamano di nuovo?

translation.en: I found it soaking wet on the floor.
-I don't know. Maybe. -How's that apartment hunt?
translation.it: - Non lo so, forse. - Come va la caccia alla casa?

translation.en: I've been looking. Everything's over 1000 bucks a month.
translation.it: Sto cercando, ma sono tutte a più di mille al mese.

translation.en: How can you put a price on privacy like that? Freedom?
translation.it: Come puoi mettere un prezzo alla privacy e alla libertà?

translation.en: Your own bathroom? Clean towels? Okay, I get it.
translation.it: Il tuo bagno, il tuo asciugamano pulito...

translation.en: It's Natalie.
Oh, hey. What about Beachwood Canyon?
translation.it: Che ne dici di Beachwood Canyon?

translation.en: Great.
If you have a car.
I mean, truth is... ...you really should get a car first.
translation.it: In realtà dovresti prima procurarti una macchina.

translation.en: I mean, this is L.A. after all. You know?
I'll tell you what.
I'm gonna suck it up...
...and let you stay a little bit longer.
Throw in something for rent, we're good.
-A second ago you wanted me out. -I don't like my towel wet.
translation.it: - Un secondo fa mi stavi cacciando. - Odio l'asciugamano bagnato.

translation.en: I don't like the lack of privacy...
translation.it: E non mi piace la mancanza di privacy...

translation.en: ...but you're in a jam.
And I'm the kind of guy...
...when a friend is in trouble, I help.
translation.it: ...se un amico è nei guai, lo aiuto.

translation.en: It's just who I am.
What did Natalie have to say?
Nothing. No, she.... What did she say?
"Hi." That was it.
-And? -And....
Her play got extended three months.
She has to pay everything there in rent...
...so I have to cover everything here.
So if you wanna stick around and chip in, it would--
-Save your ass? -Help.
Well, will you look at that?
The shoe on the other foot.
One minute I'm a freeloader... ...and the next...
translation.it: Un attimo fa ero un'approfittatrice e ora...

translation.en: ...I'm the only thing standing between you and eviction.
translation.it: ...sono l'unica che può evitarti lo sfratto.

translation.en: Just yes or no?
What's the proposal exactly?
Wonderful apartment. Bathroom included.
I'm listening.
-Use of the kitchen. -Keep going.
-Six hundred a month. -Closet?
translation.it: - 600 al mese, incluse le bollette. - Armadio?

translation.en: -Half. -Oh, look.
"Fabulous apartment with a great view."
Fine, fine.
The whole closet.
-I want the bedroom. -No way.
Oh, look. "Hot tub, Beverly Hills."
All right. You can have my bedroom.
Are you in?
See, I'm the kind of girl...
...if a friend's in trouble, I help.
translation.it: ...se un amico è nei guai, lo aiuto...

translation.en: That's just who I am.
Your dream is killing me! It's killing me!
translation.it: Il tuo sogno mi sta uccidendo!

translation.en: What was that?
And what's this?
It's something about the two mortgages.
translation.it: Qualcosa che riguarda i due mutui.

translation.en: To be perfectly honest, I haven't got a goddamn clue.
translation.it: A essere sincera, non ne ho la più pallida idea.

translation.en: But if I can't raise the amount of money...
translation.it: Ma se non riesco a rimediare quella somma...

translation.en: ...on that paper by the end of this month, I lose the club.
It's just money.
It's just a number.
I know...
...but do you think I could do it?
Okay, tell me a lie.
I need your expert sewing skills.
translation.it: Mi serve la tua perizia con l'ago.

translation.en: Tell me a new lie.
I don't love you.
Come here. Come here.
It's okay.
Wait a minute. Hey, hey. What's in that?
Iced tea.
Iced tea, my ass. Go home.
translation.it: Tè freddo un cazzo, vai a casa.

translation.en: Yeah, right. I'm about to go on.
You're not gonna go on. Go home.
Relax. It is one drink. What is the big deal?
Ali, you're gonna take Nikki's spot.
translation.it: Ali, prendi tu il suo posto.

translation.en: -She can't dance my part. -She can and she will.
translation.it: - Non può ballare la mia parte. - Può e lo farà.

translation.en: No, no. My God, I can't do that. It is Nikki's number.
translation.it: Non posso, il numero è di Nikki.

translation.en: You said you can do any number, right?
translation.it: Hai detto che potevi fare tutto.

translation.en: -I don't wanna step on any toes. -Then don't.
translation.it: - Senza pestare i piedi a qualcuno. - Allora non farlo.

translation.en: I don't ca-- Listen to me.
You're gonna go on, and you're gonna go home.
translation.it: Tu andrai in scena e tu andrai a casa.

translation.en: Here, put this on.
Tess wants to see you. Says it's urgent.
I can't leave. I'm working.
Don't say I didn't warn you.
Shit.
Everybody wants Dave to do something.
translation.it: Dave qui, Dave là, vogliono tutti qualcosa.

translation.en: Y'all gonna have me singing by the time I'm done here. Jesus.
translation.it: Vorranno pure che canti, prima o poi!

translation.en: Tess, what's up?
What are you doing back here?
-Nikki said you were looking for me. -Nikki? What is going on?
translation.it: - Nikki ha detto che mi cercavi. - Nikki? Ma che succede?

translation.en: Lower the curtain. Let's go.
Bye. Thanks for coming.
Hold it.
Raise the curtain.
Oh, my God.
Am I the only one that has no idea what just happened?
Whatever it was--
The music stopped, I didn't know what to do.
translation.it: Tess, non sapevo che altro fare...

translation.en: I had to sing, I'm sorry.
Never told me you could sing like that.
translation.it: Non mi avevi detto che cantavi così.

translation.en: I tried to tell you.
This is what we're gonna do. You know the songs, right?
translation.it: Faremo così, voi conoscete le canzoni, no?

translation.en: So tomorrow we're gonna rehearse, then you're gonna sing.
translation.it: Domani proviamo tutto il giorno e domani sera tu canti.

translation.en: We're gonna go straight through the show live.
-So any questions? -No.
Okay, good. Good. You go with the guys. Find out what keys you're comfortable singing in...
translation.it: Vai con i ragazzi, trovate la tonalità giusta...

translation.en: ...and I'm going to go up to my office and plan an entirely new show.
translation.it: ...io andrò nel mio ufficio a preparare un nuovo show.

translation.en: Thanks, Tess.
I'm gonna build a show around her.
translation.it: Costruirò lo spettacolo su di lei.

translation.en: "They don't come to hear us sing"?
They'll come to hear her sing.
So how do you feel?
-Amazing. -I've never seen anything like that.
translation.it: - È incredibile. - Non ho mai visto niente del genere.

translation.en: Thanks. Are you sure Tess really liked it? She wasn't...?
translation.it: Sicuro che sia piaciuto a Tess?

translation.en: I was bringing down the curtain.
She stopped me. She's the one who let you sing.
translation.it: Mi ha fermato lei. È stata lei a lasciarti cantare.

translation.en: -Really? -She wants to build a show around you.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Vuole costruire lo spettacolo su di te.

translation.en: You're crying with happiness, right?
Clearly one of us has underestimated the other.
translation.it: Evidentemente una di noi due ha sottovalutato l'altra.

translation.en: I can't believe Tess has you buried in the kick line.
translation.it: Tess ti teneva a sgambettare nelle retrovie!

translation.en: She didn't know I sang.
Well, you certainly can.
And you are way too good to be doing it here.
translation.it: E sei troppo brava per farlo qui.

translation.en: How about a drink?
The bar's right over there.
Tell Jack I sent you.
translation.it: Di' a Jack che ti mando io.

translation.en: Where the hell did that come from?
translation.it: Da dove l'hai tirata fuori quella voce?

translation.en: -Who knew that you could do that? -Thanks, Jack.
Who knew any white chick could sing like that?
How do you do that?
I don't know. It just happens. I just do it.
translation.it: Non lo so, succede e basta.

translation.en: I know how that feels. I gotta pee again, so....
translation.it: Conosco la sensazione. Devo rifare pipì!

translation.en: We're gonna get something to eat.
You wanna come?
Yeah, I would.
Look at you.
What? What?
Well, no, just the way you're gazing after her.
translation.it: Solo il modo in cui la segui con lo sguardo.

translation.en: I have a fiancée, remember?
Yes. No, I do. I know. Three thousand miles away.
translation.it: Sì, lo so. A tremila miglia da qui.

translation.en: We talk every day.
You do? About what?
Let me guess, don't tell me.
About her.
Her.
And, I don't know....
Her.
All I'm saying is that that one there...
...is beautiful on the inside as well...
...and she's not going to be available forever.
Relationship advice from Mr. One-Night-Stand himself.
Forgot my purse.
-What? -Oh, no.
I was just telling Jack here how every opportunity has a shelf life.
translation.it: Dicevo a Jack che ogni opportunità ha una scadenza.

translation.en: Come here.
Look there.
Awfully pretty, but too much.
See, I like that.
No, I'm not cutting my hair.
Who said anything about you cutting your hair? You can wear a wig.
translation.it: Chi ha detto che li devi tagliare? Puoi mettere una parrucca.

translation.en: I'm wearing one right now.
Where have I been all my life?
Hey there, big boy.
So, what do you think?
I think you look....
I mean, it looks....
Jack, we're friends, for chrissake. It's not like we're brother and sister.
translation.it: Siamo amici, porca miseria, non fratello e sorella.

translation.en: No, we certainly are not.
I don't get why everyone's having a conniption.
translation.it: Non capisco questa frenesia per lei.

translation.en: She's just a tacky farm girl from Iowa.
And we know a cow when we see one.
translation.it: E noi riconosciamo una vacca a prima vista.

translation.en: Don't underestimate us farm girls.
This round's on me.
I don't normally do this...
...but, Vince, I'm doubling my offer.
It's either you or the auction house.
translation.it: O va a te o va all'asta.

translation.en: No, I am not selling.
Know what happens when you default on a loan?
translation.it: Sai che succede se salti i pagamenti?

translation.en: No, hum a few bars.
I'm not screwing around. Where's the money coming from?
translation.it: Non scherzo. Dove li trovi tutti quei soldi?

translation.en: Ali's a hit. We can charge 50 bucks a head now.
Raising the admission? That's not good enough.
You have been saying that the sky is falling forever.
translation.it: È una vita che dici che succede il finimondo...

translation.en: Everything always works out fine.
Tell that to the people losing everything.
translation.it: Dillo a quelli che perderanno tutto.

translation.en: I don't wanna be one of them.
translation.it: Non voglio essere uno di loro.

translation.en: -I love this place too. -No, you don't. -I do. -No, you don't!
translation.it: - Anch'io amo questo posto! - Non è vero.

translation.en: -Yes, I do! -Oh, no, you don't.
Look, you have many fine qualities, Vincent.
And then you've got some iffy qualities.
But you've never been a phony.
translation.it: Ma non sei mai stato un ipocrita.

translation.en: Just tell Marcus no.
Yep. Just got in.
I'm in here. Can you come zip me up?
Hey, where you been?
Writing music.
Can I hear?
-It's not ready. -It's not ready.
Who's that?
Me and my mom on my 7th birthday. She died a few weeks later.
translation.it: Io e mia madre al mio 7° compleanno, morì poche settimane dopo.

translation.en: You must miss her.
Every single day something happens that I wish I could tell her about.
translation.it: Ogni giorno succede qualcosa che vorrei raccontarle.

translation.en: And what happened today?
Nothing yet.
You should get that. It's probably Natalie.
Probably.
Check it out, girls!
I'm starved. You ready?
I can't. I'm so sorry. I have to do inventory tonight.
translation.it: Non posso, mi dispiace, devo fare l'inventario.

translation.en: Want me to call a cab?
No, that's okay. I'll get a ride with Coco.
Sorry.
Watch your back. Coming through.
You ready?
-For what? -I'll drop you off.
Coco left five minutes ago.
I was coming to talk to you. I caught your conversation.
translation.it: Volevo parlare con te e ho sentito la fine della conversazione.

translation.en: -Talk to me about...? -Dinner. With me. Give me that.
translation.it: - Mi volevi parlare? - Di una cena con me.

translation.en: If you ever expect to see this bag alive again...
translation.it: Se ci tieni a rivedere viva questa borsa...

translation.en: ...you'll follow me.
Hold on a second. Where you going? Hey!
Where are you taking me? This is not the way to my place.
translation.it: Dove mi porti? Di qua non si va a casa mia.

translation.en: I told you. Dinner.
Dinner? I'm not going to dinner with you. You're seeing Nikki.
translation.it: Io non vengo a cena con te, tu esci con Nikki.

translation.en: We're just friends.
Where I come from, friends don't chew on earlobes.
translation.it: Dalle mie parti gli amici non si mordicchiano i lobi.

translation.en: Aren't you glad you left?
translation.it: Non sei felice di essere scappata?

translation.en: -Oh, damn it. -What?
I gotta make a quick appearance at a party.
translation.it: Mi sono ricordato che devo passare a una festa.

translation.en: You just remembered.
It's on the way. We'll be quick. Ten minutes, tops. Do you mind?
And if I do?
Then you've been kidnapped.
Nice house.
What are you doing? You can't just take that.
Put that back. You're gonna get us kicked out.
translation.it: Mettilo a posto, ci farai cacciare.

translation.en: Not if we sneak out.
translation.it: No, ce la svigniamo prima noi.

translation.en: Hey, hey. Greg, Marla, this is Ali.
My God, those are amazing shoes.
Aren't they? Louboutin.
Great party.
Always good to have you, man.
Wait a minute. You had to make an appearance at your own party?
translation.it: Dovevi fare un salto alla tua festa?

translation.en: Would've been rude not to, right?
You'd like those guys. Greg's an editor, Marla's a designer.
translation.it: Greg è caporedattore degli spettacoli al Times e Marla è designer.

translation.en: I'm gonna dream about those shoes.
L.A. looks gorgeous from up here.
That view cost me three times what the house did.
translation.it: La vista mi è costata tre volte la casa.

translation.en: See that strip mall down there?
You own that too?
No. I own everything above it.
-There is nothing above it. -Exactly.
-So you own air. -Air rights.
translation.it: - Sei proprietario dell'aria. - Della colonna d'aria.

translation.en: Guy that owns the mall ran into money issues, almost had to sell.
translation.it: Il proprietario del centro commerciale stava per vendere.

translation.en: Whoever he sold to would've put up a huge tower.
So I bought the air rights.
-No one can build above one story. -Well, aren't you clever.
translation.it: - Ora nessuno può costruire. - Che furbo.

translation.en: Mall guy gets to keep his property, I keep the second best view in L.A.
translation.it: Lui si tiene il centro commerciale, io la seconda miglior vista.

translation.en: What's the first?
-How many girls you used that line on? -None who called me on it.
translation.it: - Con quante l'hai già usata? - Ma nessuna si è risentita.

translation.en: What do you want, Ali?
In life.
And why should I tell you?
You're talented enough to get what you want...
translation.it: Perché tu hai il talento per arrivare dove vuoi...

translation.en: ...and I'm smart enough to make it happen.
-Somebody got a package. -Ali.
-Come on, open it. -Let's see. Come on.
Those are so cute.
Who's the sucker?
Let's go. Girls, please, break it up.
Coco, let's go. Five minutes.
Ali Cat, you're up next.
My nana used to call me Ali Cat.
translation.it: Anche mia nonna mi chiamava così!

translation.en: Did she really? That's fascinating.
-Why don't I have a nickname? -Oh, you do.
translation.it: - Perché io non ho un nomignolo? - Ce l'hai.

translation.en: -Well, he never uses it. -No, I do.
translation.it: - Lui non lo usa mai. - Lo uso.

translation.en: When?
When you leave the room.
-Slut. -I heard that.
So sorry! I had no idea! Oh, my God.
Girls, come on! We have a show to do! Let's go, let's go!
You were out late last night.
Oh, I got a ride home with that guy...
Went to a party.
New shoes?
Classy.
There's only one reason a man buys a woman shoes.
translation.it: Un uomo compra le scarpe a una donna per un solo motivo.

translation.en: So what if I'm getting a little male attention?
translation.it: È solo un po' di attenzione maschile.

translation.en: You're getting more than a little.
Not from anyone that matters.
translation.it: Non da uno che mi interessa.

translation.en: I just think you should be careful.
And I think if you need to tell a girl what she should and shouldn't do...
translation.it: E io penso che se senti di dover dire a una ragazza cosa deve fare...

translation.en: ...you should pick up the phone and call your fiancée.
-That's major. -My goodness.
Major? Check again. The only thing major is the size of Coco's ass.
translation.it: L'unica cosa super è la dimensione del culo di Coco!

translation.en: Monsieur Louboutin is at Table 18 and he's asking for you.
translation.it: Monsieur Louboutin è al tavolo 18 e chiede di te.

translation.en: It's a weird angle.
There she is, the girl of the hour.
You'd go to any length.
translation.it: Ho capito che faresti di tutto.

translation.en: I just made a call to Greg at the Times.
translation.it: Ho solo chiamato Greg al Times.

translation.en: I want you to meet a friend of mine. Ali Rose, Harold Saint.
translation.it: Voglio presentarti un amico: Ali Rose, Harold Saint.

translation.en: Harold--? Shut up. You worked with Etta James.
translation.it: Non è possibile! Tu hai lavorato con Etta James.

translation.en: Her. Chewed me up and spat me out, that one.
translation.it: Quella prima mi ha spolpato e poi mi ha scaricato!

translation.en: You've got a set of pipes too, young lady.
translation.it: Hai una bella ugola anche tu.

translation.en: You snooze, you lose, pretty boy.
translation.it: Chi dorme non piglia pesci, bel bambino.

translation.en: Standing room only.
Doesn't it look great?
But I just got another notice from the bank.
translation.it: Ma ho ricevuto un altro avviso dalla banca.

translation.en: We would have to fill Dodger Stadium for a month to come up with the cash.
translation.it: Dovremmo riempire uno stadio per un mese per avere i soldi.

translation.en: I gotta figure out a way to buy us more time.
translation.it: Devo solo trovare il modo di guadagnare tempo.

translation.en: That really is a great shot.
It's so weird seeing myself in the paper like that.
translation.it: Mi fa strano vedermi su un giornale.

translation.en: Well, you might have to get used to it.
I don't think I ever could.
You know, I don't wanna come off like the wise old fairy godmother...
translation.it: Non vorrei sembrare la vecchia madrina saggia delle favole...

translation.en: ...but maybe you could learn from my mistakes.
translation.it: ...ma forse potresti imparare dai miei errori.

translation.en: What do you mean?
You gotta learn who are the people you can trust...
translation.it: Devi imparare a capire di chi ti puoi fidare...

translation.en: ...the people who like you for you...
...and who are the people who just want something.
-You don't like Marcus, do you? -No, I don't.
translation.it: - Non ti piace Marcus, vero? - No.

translation.en: I don't like him. I don't trust him.
translation.it: Non mi piace, non mi fido...

translation.en: I don't think you should trust him.
But is that really what's best for me or what's best for you?
translation.it: Ed è la cosa migliore per me o per te?

translation.en: I don't know.
I hope it's best for both of us.
translation.it: Spero sia la migliore per tutte e due.

translation.en: All right.
See you tomorrow.
There you are.
These babies desperately need your glue gun, okay?
translation.it: Questi tesorini hanno bisogno della tua pistola a caldo.

translation.en: -Especially this one. -Okay.
She's not going anywhere.
-Good night. -Night.
Oh, hey, Tess.
I got that track you wanted to rehearse for tomorrow.
translation.it: Ho quella canzone che volevi provare per domani sera.

translation.en: Jesus.
Honey, I'm sorry. I got a million things on my mind and I completely forgot.
translation.it: Scusa, ho mille pensieri, me n'ero dimenticata.

translation.en: It's all good.
If it's too late I can come in early tomorrow?
translation.it: Se è troppo tardi, posso venire domattina presto.

translation.en: No, no. Let's just get it out of the way.
You want a spot?
Yeah.
-Tess, we need to talk. -No.
-Yes. -I'm tired, Nikki. Well, then you can just listen.
We built this club together...
...and then some girl shows up from nowhere...
translation.it: ...poi è arrivata una ragazza che non ha neanche fatto la gavetta--

translation.en: -...who hasn't paid her dues-- -How do you know?
translation.it: ...poi è arrivata una ragazza che non ha neanche fatto la gavetta-- Che ne sai?

translation.en: Doesn't sing that way because she's had it easy.
translation.it: Non canta così perché ha avuto la vita facile.

translation.en: "They don't come to hear us sing, Nikki."
Or is that just bullshit now?
translation.it: O quella ora è una stronzata?

translation.en: You're drunk. Go inside and call a cab.
I will not be upstaged by some slut!
translation.it: Non mi faccio scavalcare da una puttana coi polmoni da mutante!

translation.en: Then leave.
You'd ruin our friendship over some girl you barely know?
translation.it: Rovini la nostra amicizia per una che neanche conosci?

translation.en: So much for loyalty!
Since when did you know anything about loyalty?
translation.it: Da quando sei esperta di lealtà?

translation.en: How many times have I peeled you off the sidewalk?
translation.it: Da quanti marciapiedi ti ho dovuto tirare su?

translation.en: How many blackouts? How many times have I held your head...
translation.it: Quante volte ti ho tenuto la testa sul gabinetto...

translation.en: ...while you threw up everything but memories?
Okay, fine! But I will not stand in the back!
translation.it: Va bene! Ma non ballerò nell'ombra...

translation.en: Tess, you need to fix this--
You think you're my only problem? I'm about to lose my club.
translation.it: Pensi di essere il mio unico problema? Mi portano via il locale...

translation.en: The only thing that means anything to me.
I have more to worry about than you pouring tequila on your Cheerios.
translation.it: Ho già abbastanza guai senza te che mangi cereali e tequila!

translation.en: Fine.
-I quit! -I'm glad!
Nikki, don't drive.
By the way...
...I slept with Vince the night after your honeymoon.
translation.it: ...sono andata a letto con Vince la notte dopo la vostra luna di miele.

translation.en: You crazy bitch!
Morning.
Do you really have to do that at 6 a.m.?
translation.it: Devi proprio farlo alle 6 di mattina?

translation.en: Coffee?
No, but a little peace and quiet would be nice.
translation.it: No, ma un po' di pace...

translation.en: You are a little overdressed for breakfast.
translation.it: Sei troppo elegante per la colazione.

translation.en: My pajamas were in the bedroom, which was occupied.
translation.it: Il pigiama era in camera mia, che era occupata.

translation.en: You're never here, so it'd be stupid for me to crash on the couch...
translation.it: Non ci sei mai, è stupido che io dorma sul divano...

translation.en: ...when there is a perfectly good, empty bed right there.
So, what, do you want the bedroom back?
Should be used by someone.
I'm home every night.
translation.it: Torno a casa tutte le notti.

translation.en: Maybe not when you think I should be. You are my roommate, not my mother.
translation.it: Forse non quando vorresti tu, ma sei il mio coinquilino, non mia madre.

translation.en: However, since it's such an issue....
translation.it: Visto che ne fai un dramma...

translation.en: What the hell. Take the bedroom. I'll sleep on the couch.
-Fine! -Fine.
-You're gonna have to move your shit. -I realize.
translation.it: - Però sposti la tua roba. - Lo so.

translation.en: It is a total mess in there.
You got stuff everywhere. Clothes, shoes, hair--
translation.it: C'è roba dovunque, vestiti, scarpe, parrucche--

translation.en: Jesus! What is your problem? You're acting like a prick.
translation.it: Qual è il problema? Stai facendo lo stronzo.

translation.en: Something you wanna say?
It's not just me.
The people that care about you are worried.
translation.it: Le persone che ti vogliono bene sono preoccupate.

translation.en: What people?
People, you know? People. Your friends at the club.
We're like a family. And we look out for each other.
translation.it: Siamo come una famiglia, ci proteggiamo.

translation.en: You look out for each other. Like Vince looks after Tess.
And like Nikki looks out for everybody.
And Marcus? He's gonna look out for you?
No, it's fine. It's fine.
He can make things happen for you.
translation.it: Può farti avere quello che vuoi.

translation.en: So go ahead, make a deal with the devil.
translation.it: Vai, fai un patto col diavolo.

translation.en: First, Marcus is not the devil.
translation.it: Primo, Marcus non è il diavolo...

translation.en: He's a smart businessman...
...who happens to be a gentleman who knows what he wants and goes for it.
translation.it: ...e anche un gentiluomo, sa cosa vuole e lo prende.

translation.en: I'm just saying. Life is about the choices you make.
translation.it: Io dico solo che la vita è la somma delle tue scelte.

translation.en: The choices I make?
You're a bartender-slash-piano player...
...who writes songs that are never ready.
That's perfect. Perfect.
Please, try not to destroy my apartment. Thanks.
translation.it: Sei pregata di non distruggermi la casa.

translation.en: I now pronounce you husband and wife.
You may kiss the bride.
Wait, what do you mean you are still in New York? Why?
translation.it: Sei ancora a New York? Perché?

translation.en: So you just decided not to come?
translation.it: Hai appena deciso che non vieni?

translation.en: Why does every conversation we have end up being about your future?
translation.it: Perché si parla sempre di te e del tuo futuro?

translation.en: You know, you're right.
We should start thinking about our futures.
translation.it: Dobbiamo pensare ognuno al proprio futuro.

translation.en: And I might be looking at mine right now.
translation.it: Forse io sto guardando il mio.

translation.en: That DJ is hot. You think so?
translation.it: - Quel Dj è un fico. - Dici?

translation.en: He keeps looking at me.
Maybe he's cuckoo for Coco Puffs. Really? You think?
translation.it: - Forse è goloso di "Coco Puff". - Davvero?

translation.en: Yeah. I think.
He's gorgeous. I think he likes me.
He is gorgeous.
Who is paying for this wedding? This rental must have cost a fortune.
translation.it: Chi paga il matrimonio? Questo posto sarà costato una fortuna.

translation.en: Damon's dad is loaded.
translation.it: Il padre di Damon è straricco.

translation.en: Is he single?
I'm just kidding. I'm kidding.
Guess Georgia's not as dumb as I thought.
translation.it: Georgia non è così scema come pensavo.

translation.en: Would you ever do this again?
There's only one man I could see spending the rest of my life with.
translation.it: C'è solo un uomo con cui potrei passare tutta la vita...

translation.en: And unfortunately, except for a really drunk night in Reno 25,000 years ago...
translation.it: ...ma purtroppo, a parte una notte folle da ubriachi a Reno 25.000 anni fa...

translation.en: ...he bats for the other team.
Oh, no. He bats for the pink team.
translation.it: Gli piace la mazza da baseball?

translation.en: That is tragique.
I know.
Well, it's like all truly great love affairs.
translation.it: È come le grandi storie d'amore.

translation.en: Tragic.
It wasn't Reno. It was Tahoe, baby.
translation.it: Non era Reno, era Tahoe, bambola.

translation.en: And it was lovely.
Get a room. Get away.
Shot of Patrón, please.
translation.it: Uno shot di Patrón, per favore.

translation.en: Make it two. Make it two.
Looking kind of lonely there, Jack.
Liberated, maybe.
Libated, definitely.
But lonely, no. Never lonely.
Cheers.
How's it going?
God. What are we, in junior high?
Iowa, are you still mad at me?
translation.it: Iowa, ce l'hai ancora con me?

translation.en: You know, because if you are...
...bring it on, baby.
Are you drunk?
Oh, I love this song. Yes!
Oh, you rock.
I'm sorry for being a class-A prick.
translation.it: Scusa se sono stato uno stronzo.

translation.en: You were.
I was.
And, as of about...
...some time ago, I am officially a single man.
translation.it: ...un po' di tempo fa, sono ufficialmente single.

translation.en: You and Natalie broke up?
translation.it: Tu e Natalie vi siete lasciati?

translation.en: That we did.
Which explains why I am here alone.
translation.it: Ecco perché sono qui da solo.

translation.en: So...
...why are you here alone?
Do I really look alone to you?
Oh, my feet are killing me. Take off these shoes, please. Help me.
translation.it: Ho i piedi distrutti, toglimi queste scarpe, ti prego!

translation.en: Wait, wait. Be careful.
Stay.
Good night.
Night.
Cute jammies.
My mother got me these, thank you very much.
And I haven't worn them yet, so....
Go figure.
I forgot to lock the door.
-Got it? -Good.
Good night.
Back again?
Water. Don't want a hangover.
Smart.
Good night. Again.
Now, I know-- I know I forgot something else.
I remember I locked the door.
translation.it: Ricordo di aver chiuso la porta.

translation.en: That's it. Hungry. I'm hungry.
-What is so funny? -Jack! Well, you're--
Well, I never.
-Jack. -Want a cookie?
It's your loss. You change your mind...
translation.it: Peggio per te. Se cambi idea...

translation.en: ...you know where they are.
So it's official.
What?
You are definitely not gay.
So, what about Natalie?
Natalie who?
Do that again.
Now come here.
I mean, I don't really know what happened.
I had won the Nashville Teen Songwriting Contest.
translation.it: Avevo vinto il Concorso per giovani cantautori, a Nashville.

translation.en: I even still have my little trophy.
translation.it: Ho ancora il mio piccolo trofeo.

translation.en: So I took that as-- I thought I was supposed to do something important with my life.
translation.it: Pensavo di dover fare qualcosa di importante nella vita.

translation.en: Then I got to L.A.
And nothing happened.
Nothing.
Well, you know what?
I believe your music is ready.
translation.it: Secondo me, la tua musica è pronta.

translation.en: The question is...
...are you ready?
-For what? -Are you ready? Here I come.
-I knew it. -Natalie.
You are a liar. A pathetic, sneaky little liar!
What is she doing here?
I live here. I wanna know why you are here.
translation.it: Io ci vivo! Che ci fai tu!

translation.en: I can't believe I bought your bullshit. "She's nothing. She's not even pretty."
translation.it: Ti ho pure creduto: "Non è niente, è una con cui lavoro, non è neanche carina".

translation.en: Well, at least you were honest about one thing.
translation.it: Almeno su una cosa sei stato sincero!

translation.en: -You said that? -I did not.
I'm sorry, could you just give me some time--?
translation.it: Scusa, ci dai un po' di tempo--?

translation.en: You're asking me to leave?
-No. -Yes, you. I'm the fiancée.
-You told me you broke it off with her. -I did.
translation.it: - Hai detto che l'avevi lasciata. - Infatti!

translation.en: You break up with me over the phone?
translation.it: Lasci una come me al telefono?

translation.en: -I'm out of here. You told me it was over. -No. Ali.
translation.it: - Me ne vado. - No, ti prego!

translation.en: -Ali, please. -What, Jack?
-I am sorry. -So am I.
translation.it: - Che c'è? - Mi dispiace. Anche a me.

translation.en: I'm out. Ali, wait. Please.
I must have the wrong apartment.
Who are you looking for?
-I'm looking for Sean. -Sean.
What's he look like?
Yea high.
Shaved head.
Brown eyes. Glasses.
I've been calling him John.
No, it's Sean.
Is that him?
-What are you doing here? -It's a long story.
translation.it: - Che ci fai qui? - È una lunga storia.

translation.en: I shouldn't have come here. I see I've obviously interrupted something.
translation.it: Non dovevo venire, è ovvio che vi ho disturbato.

translation.en: Might be a bad time. No, that's okay.
translation.it: - Forse ho sbagliato momento. - No, va bene.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Ali, did you meet...
-...Mike? -Close. My name is Mark.
Sorry.
Does anybody want any coffee?
Yeah. Why don't I go make the coffee...
translation.it: Io vado a fare il caffè e...

translation.en: ...and you guys get better acquainted.
Sorry. Did I call you Mike last night?
translation.it: Scusa, ti ho chiamato Mike stanotte?

translation.en: Yes. Yeah.
-But I called you John, so.... -Really?
translation.it: - Ma io ti ho chiamato John. - Davvero?

translation.en: You liked it.
John was my mother's name.
translation.it: John era il nome di mia madre.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, gorgeous.
You okay? You sound down.
I've been better.
Well, I have just the cure.
-What's that? -Me.
Why don't you come over for dinner?
translation.it: Perché non vieni da me a cena?

translation.en: -Bye. -Yeah, bye. You....
You take care...
-...Sean. -You too. Okay.
Is Ali here?
Ali left.
She went with Marcus.
Is that true? Yeah.
-What? -She left a couple hours ago.
I told you that opportunity wouldn't knock forever.
translation.it: Te l'ho detto che le occasioni non durano per sempre.

translation.en: You're right. It doesn't.
You.
It's Mark.
Do you want to have some lunch?
Yeah. Sure.
You're cooking.
I just wasted my whole goddamn afternoon...
...talking with the vice president of loans.
translation.it: ...a parlare con il vicepresidente della finanziaria.

translation.en: This asshole-- No, wait. He didn't even look me in the eye.
translation.it: Lo stronzo non mi ha neanche guardato negli occhi.

translation.en: He just sat there, playing with this wooden thingy on his desk.
translation.it: Giocherellava con un cosetto di legno sulla scrivania.

translation.en: -What thingy? What? -The long wooden block thingy.
translation.it: - Quale cosetto? - Un cosetto di legno!

translation.en: The nameplate?
Yes. Nameplate.
And he's not gonna give me the money.
-Are you sure? -Yes, I'm sure.
I'm not a good risk.
And I've got two days before the bank takes the club.
translation.it: E fra due giorni si prendono il locale.

translation.en: Well, then...
...I would say that the situation is pretty bleak.
And I would say that you are a master of the fucking obvious.
translation.it: E tu sei il maestro delle cazzate ovvie.

translation.en: Why did you say that?
What do you mean, "Why did I say that"? Because it's the truth.
translation.it: Come sarebbe? Perché è la verità.

translation.en: Tess, it's not a judgment, it's the truth.
You don't have any money.
The bank won't give you a loan. It's the eleventh hour.
translation.it: ...la banca non ti dà il prestito, siamo agli sgoccioli.

translation.en: Hello?
If I were you, I would take Marcus's offer now.
translation.it: Se fossi in te, accetterei l'offerta di Marcus.

translation.en: No.
And you don't get to say that to me.
translation.it: E non hai il diritto di parlarmi così!

translation.en: I can take "the sky is falling" from everyone else, but not you.
translation.it: Tutti possono dire che succederà il finimondo, ma non tu.

translation.en: You know, I need you to be the one that says:
translation.it: Tu devi essere quello che dice:

translation.en: "It's only a number, Tess."
We have killed ourselves to keep this place going.
translation.it: Ci siamo ammazzati per mandare avanti questo posto...

translation.en: How can you just walk away?
I don't care if you walk away, I don't care what happens.
translation.it: Non m'importa se tu te ne vai...

translation.en: I will beat down the door of every bank in L.A.
translation.it: ...andrò a bussare a tutte le banche di L.A.!

translation.en: I will never give up this club.
Are you sure?
I will never give it up.
There she is.
I thought I'd lost you for a minute at the beginning there.
You are such an asshole.
Thank you.
Hope you're hungry. Steaks are on.
translation.it: Spero che tu abbia fame, le bistecche stanno cuocendo.

translation.en: What is this?
Right now it's a model.
When it grows up it'll be multi-use space...
...residential, retail.
But this is the Burlesque Lounge.
Best view on the Sunset Strip...
translation.it: La miglior vista di Sunset Strip.

translation.en: ...with no windows.
When I'm through with it, it'll have a thousand.
translation.it: Quando avrò finito, ne avrà mille.

translation.en: Does Tess know about this?
translation.it: - Tess lo sa? - Sa che le ho fatto un'offerta.

translation.en: -Tess knows I've made an offer to buy. -What makes you think she'd sell?
translation.it: - Tess lo sa? - Sa che le ho fatto un'offerta. - Cosa ti fa pensare che lo venderà? - Non ha scelta.

translation.en: I don't think she has a choice. She's going under.
translation.it: - Cosa ti fa pensare che lo venderà? - Non ha scelta. Le ho fatto un'offerta generosa. Sono affari, niente di personale.

translation.en: It's a win-win situation for everyone. It's business, not personal.
translation.it: Le ho fatto un'offerta generosa. Sono affari, niente di personale.

translation.en: I think it's personal for Tess.
And for Coco and Sean and....
What about me?
There are other clubs that you can sing and dance in. Better ones.
translation.it: Ci sono locali migliori dove puoi cantare e ballare.

translation.en: You don't get it.
I don't understand. I'm trying to do something that benefits everyone.
translation.it: Cerco di fare una cosa che aiuti tutti.

translation.en: -How does that make me the bad guy? -It doesn't, Marcus.
translation.it: - Perché sono il cattivo? - Non lo sei.

translation.en: It just makes you the wrong guy.
So how'd it go at the bank?
This good.
You want a glass for that?
No, no. I am way beyond a glass.
-Tess, I gotta talk to you. -Not right now.
translation.it: - Tess, ti devo parlare. - Non adesso.

translation.en: Marcus is gonna tear down the club and build a skyscraper.
translation.it: Marcus vuole abbattere il locale per costruire un grattacielo.

translation.en: And how do you know this?
-I saw the model. -I didn't know you were close.
translation.it: - Ho visto il modello. - Non sapevo che foste così intimi.

translation.en: We're not. I rushed over so I could tell you.
translation.it: Non lo siamo, sono corsa a dirtelo.

translation.en: You're spreading yourself a little bit thin.
translation.it: Non ti stai dando un po' troppo da fare?

translation.en: Jack, Marcus, whoever.
Tess, I'm trying to help you.
-Let it go. -She's gotta listen. Okay. Let it go, let it go.
-She needs to listen. -She can't now.
Well, she's gonna hear me. Watch this.
translation.it: Invece mi ascolterà, stai a vedere.

translation.en: Tess, I gotta talk to you.
-You could knock. This is still my office. -You need to hear what I tell you.
translation.it: Potresti bussare, è ancora il mio ufficio per 48 ore. Devi starmi a sentire.

translation.en: I don't. I am tired of talking. I am talked out.
-Hear me out. -I don't wanna hear you out.
Do you ever listen to anything other than your own voice?
translation.it: Ascolti mai qualcosa che non sia il suono della tua voce?

translation.en: Talk.
Have you ever heard of air rights?
No, I've never heard of air rights. What are air rights?
Now, that's funny.
Jim, let me call you back, huh?
Please sit down.
A few years ago you wanted to buy my club and I said no.
translation.it: Qualche anno fa lei voleva comprare il mio locale e le ho detto di no.

translation.en: Yeah, and now you changed your mind?
No, but just bear with me for a second...
...because I promise this is gonna have a happy ending for both of us.
translation.it: ...perché ci sarà un lieto fine per entrambi.

translation.en: How much you planning to sell your condos for?
translation.it: A quanto pensa di vendere gli appartamenti?

translation.en: Well, they start at a million and go up from there, depending on the view.
translation.it: Vanno dal milione in su, a seconda della vista.

translation.en: That's beautiful.
So, what if I told you that a 20-story office building...
translation.it: Se le dicessi che costruiranno un grattacielo di venti piani...

translation.en: ...was going up where my club is?
That would block his view.
-Ten stories would block his view. -Yeah. Gone.
The way I see it, your beautiful million-dollar ocean and city views...
translation.it: La sua vista da un milione di dollari sull'oceano e sulla città...

translation.en: ...are just gonna vanish into thin air. -Vanish. -Yeah.
Because tomorrow I am going to sell my club to this developer...
translation.it: ...perché domani venderò il locale a un'impresa...

translation.en: ...and his 20 stories are gonna be well underway by the time you start selling.
translation.it: ...e i venti piani saranno avviati prima che lei inizi a vendere.

translation.en: -Trying to sell. -Yeah. Right.
And so I think that we should talk.
I'd listen to her.
We're gonna have to auction off everything.
Anything you want me to keep for you?
I just wanna try and do what's best for both of us.
translation.it: Voglio fare quello che è meglio per tutti e due.

translation.en: You gonna shoot me? Please?
No. I'm gonna buy you out.
In the next 24 hours?
No, in the next 24 seconds.
Where did you get this?
Thin air.
Oh, baby.
Thank you.
Just put it out in the universe.
What would really make me so happy...
translation.it: Quello che mi renderebbe davvero felice...

translation.en: ...is to hear from you...
...a great, big, giant, fat:
"Thank you, Ali."
I didn't sleep with Vince, I just said that to hurt you.
translation.it: Non sono andata a letto con Vince, l'ho detto per ferirti.

translation.en: I crossed the line.
You think?
I wanna come home.
Okay, you're home.
Now get your ass upstairs and get ready, you're on in 20 minutes.
translation.it: Muovi le chiappe e cambiati, sei di scena fra venti minuti.

translation.en: And if you ever pull half of the crap that she pulled...
translation.it: Se tu farai solo la metà delle cazzate che ha fatto lei...

translation.en: ...you are gonna be out so quick it's gonna make your head spin.
translation.it: ...ti caccerò a calci così velocemente che ti girerà la testa.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
And don't ever call me "ma'am" again.
translation.it: E non chiamarmi mai più signora.

translation.en: I'm gonna go get dressed for the show.
Thank you, Ali.
So this is what happens when you get a little money?
translation.it: Va così quando si fanno un po' di soldi.

translation.en: You stop doing manual labor. I'm back there with broken zippers...
translation.it: Tu smetti di fare i lavori manuali e io sono lì con le lampo rotte...

translation.en: ...and ostrich feather fans that won't open or close.
translation.it: ...e i ventagli di struzzo che non si aprono.

translation.en: You have no idea what it's like. No idea. I quit. Quit.
translation.it: Non hai idea, me ne vado.

translation.en: -Can I use this? -Don't touch my stuff.
translation.it: - Posso usarlo? - Non toccare le mie cose!

translation.en: I've been looking for you.
Well, you found me.
I wanna talk to you.
I really have to get ready.
I know I messed up, okay? Bigtime.
translation.it: So che ho fatto un casino pazzesco.

translation.en: When? When you lied to me about your engagement being over...
translation.it: Quando? Quando hai mentito sul fidanzamento...

translation.en: ...or when you kicked me out?
It really was over. Okay? And she's gone.
translation.it: Era finito davvero e se n'è andata.

translation.en: I'm here to apologize.
I never should have let you walk out that door.
translation.it: Non avrei mai dovuto lasciarti uscire da quella porta.

translation.en: Go on.
I want you to come back.
So, what's the proposal, exactly?
...I still have that full box of cookies.
translation.it: Ho ancora quella scatola di biscotti.

translation.en: And an empty day bed.
translation.it: E un letto vuoto di giorno.

translation.en: I want the bedroom.
Half.
So are you in or are you out?
Oh, Jack. Now, see...
...I'm the kind of girl that, when a friend's in trouble, I help.
translation.it: ...sono fatta così, quando un amico è nei guai, lo aiuto.

translation.en: That's just who I am. Shut up.
translation.it: - È il mio cara-- - Stai zitta.

translation.en: I finished a song.
I think it's pretty good.
-Can I hear it? -No.
But you can sing it.
